block.p: American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS -- Extended their working agreement with Medicine Hat of the Pioneer League for two years.
American League TORONTO BLUE JAYS -- Extended their working agreement with Medicine Hat of the Pioneer League for two years.
National League SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS -- Announced a two-year player development contract agreement with Fresno of the Pacific Coast League and Hagerstown of the South Atlantic League.
National Basketball Association MIAMI HEAT -- Signed C Todd Fuller and F Don MacLean.

National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS -- Released CB Sirr Parker from the practice squad. Signed LB Marc Megna to the practice squad. DENVER BRONCOS -- Signed WR Scottie Montgomery to the practice squad. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS -- Waived LB Josh Gentry from the practice squad. Re-signed RB Lennox Gordon to the practice squad. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS -- Waived RB Chris Howard. Activated LB Erik Storz from the practice squad. Signed TE Ryan Neufeld to the practice squad.

National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES -- Reassigned G Brad Guzda. Returned G Craig Andersson, C Mathieu Cusson, D Wade Davis, D Kurtis Foster, G Brent Krahn, LW Quinton Laing, LW Travis Moen, C Cory Pecker, C Warren Peters and C Jarrett Stoll to their junior/university teams. FLORIDA PANTHERS -- Reassigned LW Josh Olson and RW Sean O'Connor to their junior teams. Assigned G Ryan Bach and G Richard Shulmistra to Louisville of the AHL. NASHVILLE PREDATORS -- Released LW Eric Gooldy. Reassigned D Brett Angel, D Miroslav Durak, D Dean Serdachny, G Kyle Kettles, G Jure Penko and RW Konstantin Panov to their junior clubs. NEW YORK ISLANDERS -- Signed D Gary Galley. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS -- Signed G Maxime Ouellet to a three-year contract. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING -- Released LW Tony Lob and RW Sean O'Brien. Reassigned C Martin Cibak, C Benoit Dusablon, LW Mike Kiesman, D Kyle Kos, D Mikko Kuparinen, RW Maxim Potapov, RW Dale Rominski, F-D Kenton Smith, RW Samuel St. Pierre, RW Jan Sulc and D Mark Thompson to Detroit of the IHL and D Aaron Gionet, G Alexander Polukeyev, D Brett Scheffelmaier and RW Pavel Sedov to their junior teams.
National Professional Soccer League NPSL -- Named Steve Ryan commissioner.

DARTMOUTH -- Named Dan Boyle women's assistant basketball coach and Chris Leazier men's assistant basketball coach. HOLY CROSS -- Named Frank Mastrandrea assistant athletic director for marketing and media relations. OKLAHOMA -- Named Steve Nunno women's gymnastics co-coach and will name him coach after the 2000-1 season. SETON HALL -- Named Ginger Fulton and Keith Meyers senior associate athletic director, Patrick Elliott and Jimmy O'Donnell associate athletic director, Chris Colleary and Kevin Sponzo assistant athletic director and Jeff Andriesse to associate sports information director. TEXAS -- Named Jill Matyuch assistant softball coach. WASHINGTON -- Named Al Hairston men's assistant basketball coach.
